Header: Zverev defeats Bautista-Agut to progress in China Open
Content: Germany’s Alexander Zverev opened his campaign at the China Open in Beijing with a 6-4, 6-4 win over Roberto Bautista Agut.Tournament second seed Zverev was making his first appearance since a third-round exit at the US Open and despite an early stumble in the first set, he saw off the Spaniard in just over an hour and a half.In the next round, Zverev will face Tunisia’s Malek Jaziri who beat China’s Wu Yibing in straight sets.
